title: Audit sector in motion to fundamentally change and improve; largest firms ahead (The Netherlands Authority ...
text: ( Source : The Netherlands Authority for the Financial Markets) Audit firms are working seriously to fundamentally change and improve the preconditions to increase the quality of their statutory audits and in doing so act more in the public
